quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Dustin Hoffman and James Brown
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, hoffman. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Dustin Hoffman was born in 1937 in a Jewish family.
How many children did Dustin Hoffman have with his first wife?
Dustin Hoffman, alongside the likes of Robert De Niro and Al Pacino, is known to be a method actor.
What do James Brown, Carol Burnett, Itzak Perlman, Loretta Lynn, and Mike Nichols have in common?

options.text: They received a Kennedy Center Honor in 2003.
They received an Ammy  Award in 2004.
They were born on the same day.
Thy were born in the same year.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They received a Kennedy Center Honor in 2003.

questions.question: What character did Dustin Hoffman play in the film ‘Little Big Man’?

options.text: a hustler and smuggler in New York
a white man raised by Indians
a priest who tries to convert Indians to Christianity

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a white man raised by Indians

questions.question: In 1985, James Browns song Living in America was used in a famous movie. Who starred in the  movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sylvester Stallone

questions.question: Dustin Hoffman was born under what sign of the Zodiac?
Dustin Hoffman does not appear in which of the following movies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Squid and the Whale

questions.question: For what 1979 movie did Dustin Hoffman win his fist Oscar?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kramer vs. Kramer

questions.question: How long did James Brown serve in prison in 1986?
While still an aspiring actor in the 50s, Dustin Hoffman befriended this fellow actor, who later also rose to fame.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gene Hackman

questions.question: In 1974, James Brown performed in Africa as part of a week of entertainment leading to a famous  boxing match. Who fought in the match?
When did James Brown become one of the charter members of the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame?
Dustin Hoffman was named after Dustin Farnum, the favorite writer of his parents.
In this film Dustin Hoffman portrays a lawyer representing two young men who were molested as children and later murdered their molester.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Prince Michael Jackson II

questions.question: In what 1954 film did Marlon Brando portray Napoleon Bonaparte?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pilot Inspektor

questions.question: In what 1962 movie did Marlon Brandos character, Lt. Fletcher Christian, deliver the following line: One more order, Mr. Bligh, and Ill have your head on this deck. By Heaven, I swear it!?
